info.name: simple tumblr dashboard background changer
info.description:
very simple code to change the tumblr background
i dont know coding stuff so i couldnt make anything cooler than this tbh.

how to customize your background image:
1: click "customize" next to the "install style" button and scroll down
2: customize your background by selecting a preset, using a image URL or browse your locally saved images.
3: click "install style"

if you want to change your custom background or color and it doesnt work, uninstall the style and customize it before clicking on install style again
info.additionalInfo: added the options for custom images and color
